snippet: Kevin O’Neill was fired as Southern California’s basketball coach after three and a half years during which he failed to turn around a program weighed down by N.C.A.A. issues that preceded his arrival.
abstract: Southern California fires men's basketball coach Kevin O'Neill for failing to turn around program weighed down by NCAA issues that preceded his arrival.
lead_paragraph: Kevin O’Neill was fired as Southern California’s basketball coach after three and a half years during which he failed to turn around a program weighed down by N.C.A.A. issues that preceded his arrival.
